name: Deskbot 005
text:
[ MONSTER EFFECT ]
If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 Spell/Trap Card on the field; destroy it.
This card gains 500 ATK for each face-up "Deskbot" monster in your Extra Deck.
If this card in the Pendulum Zone is destroyed: You can target 1 "Deskbot" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it.
You can only use this effect of "Deskbot 005" once per turn.
pendulum_text:
[ PENDULUM EFFECT ]
You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Deskbot" monsters.
This effect cannot be negated.
